It also includes funding for disaster relief , health care , education , law enforcement and infrastructure projects .

sent1: Apple restarts Apple Watch sales in Germany after temporary halt over patent dispute with Swatch ; 4G model remains banned ; appeal pending .

Apple was forced by a German court last week to temporarily stop selling the Apple Watch because of an alleged patent infringement on a product sold by Swiss watchmaker Swatch Group AG . The injunction affected both online and brick - and - mortar sales , but not through third - party retailers . Apple said it would appeal the decision . Apple 's 4G version of the Apple Watch is still banned from sale in Germany .

This year , the remembrance of those who gave their lives for their country has become a focal point for the debate over the nature of Britishness . In the 2016 referendum on Brexit , the majority of voters in England and Wales voted to leave the European Union , while majorities in Scotland and Northern Ireland voted to remain . Now , some pro - EU Scots are refusing to wear the traditional poppies as an act of defiance against Brexiteers whom they accuse of hijacking British patriotism . sent1: Israel’s Supreme Court blocked a law enabling Knesset overrides , calling it a threat to judicial independence and civil rights protection , welcomed by religious pluralism advocates .
sent2: Israel’s Supreme Court rejected an attempt by the country’s legislature to limit its power , including on matters of religion and state . The court struck down a law passed last year that would have allowed the Knesset to override decisions by the court with a simple majority vote . " The Basic Law is intended to harm the status and standing of this court , ” Justice Hanan Melcer wrote in the ruling . " It is meant to ‘cut off the branch’ on which it sits . ” He said the court would not be able to fulfill its role as protector of civil rights if it were subjected to such political control . The decision was hailed by religious pluralism advocates , who had feared the legislation could be used to block their efforts to gain equal recognition under Israeli law .

sent1: Israel’s Gaza strategy fails : rockets continue , Hamas persists , infrastructure remains , and key fighters survive despite overwhelming force .

sent1: Portuguese Jesuits brought catechisms to 17th - century Goa ; Goan diaspora spread it to East Africa . This study explores how Nairobi’s Goans use catechism to negotiate belonging , identity , and continuity across religion , ethnicity , and nationality .
sent2: In the 17th century , Portuguese Jesuit missionaries introduced the catechism to the Catholic communities of Goa . The practice was carried by the Goan diaspora to East Africa , where it remains popular today . This paper examines the performance of catechisms in a Goan community in Nairobi as a way of understanding how migrants negotiate their belonging within and outside of Kenya through religious practices . Through an ethnographic study of the catechism , I will explore how Goans make sense of their place in Kenyan society through a complex negotiation of religion , ethnicity and nationality . sent1: Some are cursed by the law ; others blessed through Christ . The law reveals sin , but only Christ removes it . See your sin , flee to Jesus—He forgives the world .
sent2: Certain kinds of people get caught up in the curse of the law . It is a curse for those who seek to be justified by it . It is a blessing for those who have fled to Christ and found refuge under his blood . The law was given to lead us to Christ , not to make us righteous . The law cannot justify because it only reveals sin but cannot remove it . Only Christ can do that . When you see your sin , run to Jesus . He is the one who takes away the sins of the world .

sent1: 1970 s New Zealand study revealed seawater - transmitted cancer killing abalone and other shellfish , now found globally in marine life , possibly existing for over a century .

They discovered that the cancer had spread through seawater and had killed large numbers of other shellfish in the region as well . The cancer has since been found to have infected many types of marine life worldwide , including sea urchins , mussels and lobsters . A new study suggests it 's been around for at least a century or two . ...
